verses.text: Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waters are \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* neck.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* sunk \w into|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* miry depths, where \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* no footing; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* drifted \w into|strong="H4325"\w* deep \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, where \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flood|strong="H4325"\w* engulfs \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.
I am weary \w from|strong="H4325"\w* my crying; my throat \w is|strong="H4325"\w* parched. My eyes fail, looking \w for|strong="H4325"\w* my God.

Those \w who|strong="H7121"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7121"\w* without \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* outnumber \w the|strong="H7121"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* head; many \w are|strong="H5869"\w* those \w who|strong="H7121"\w* would \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*— \w my|strong="H3615"\w* enemies \w for|strong="H7121"\w* no reason.\f + \fr 69:4 \ft See John 15:25\f* Though \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w did|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H5869"\w* steal, \w I|strong="H5869"\w* must repay.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* know \w my|strong="H7725"\w* folly, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* guilt \w is|strong="H7218"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hidden \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w You|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w May|strong="H4480"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H3045"\w* hope \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* ashamed \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Hosts; \w may|strong="H4480"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* dishonored \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Israel.

\w For|strong="H6960"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* endured scorn \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w Your|strong="H1245"\w* sake, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* covered \w my|strong="H1245"\w* face.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w become|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreigner \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother’s sons,

because zeal \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H1961"\w* house \w has|strong="H1961"\w* consumed \w me|strong="H1961"\w*,\f + \fr 69:9 \ft Cited in John 2:17\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* insults \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* insult \w You|strong="H2114"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w fallen|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.\f + \fr 69:9 \ft Cited in Romans 15:3\f*
\w I|strong="H3588"\w* wept \w and|strong="H1004"\w* fasted, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* brought \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* sackcloth \w my|strong="H1961"\w* clothing, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* sport \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Those|strong="H1992"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w sit|strong="H5414"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* gate mock \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* song \w of|strong="H4912"\w* drunkards.

But \w my|strong="H8354"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w You|strong="H3427"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w is|strong="H8179"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* time \w of|strong="H3427"\w* favor. \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w Your|strong="H8354"\w* abundant loving devotion, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, answer me \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w Your|strong="H8354"\w* sure salvation.

Rescue \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mire \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6256"\w* \w let|strong="H6256"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* sink; deliver \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foes \w and|strong="H3068"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* deep waters.

Do \w not|strong="H4325"\w* let \w the|strong="H5337"\w* floods engulf \w me|strong="H8130"\w* or \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w depths|strong="H4615"\w* swallow \w me|strong="H8130"\w* up; let \w not|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* Pit close its mouth over \w me|strong="H8130"\w*.

Answer \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* loving devotion \w is|strong="H6310"\w* good; turn \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* keeping \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* great compassion.

Hide \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6437"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* servant, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* distress. \w Answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* quickly!

Draw \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* soul \w and|strong="H6030"\w* redeem \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; ransom \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* foes.

\w You|strong="H5315"\w* know \w my|strong="H6299"\w* reproach, \w my|strong="H6299"\w* shame \w and|strong="H7126"\w* disgrace. \w All|strong="H1350"\w* \w my|strong="H6299"\w* adversaries \w are|strong="H5315"\w* before \w You|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Insults|strong="H3639"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* broken \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* am \w in|strong="H3045"\w* despair. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* looked \w for|strong="H3605"\w* sympathy, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* comforters, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w found|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* poisoned \w my|strong="H4672"\w* food \w with|strong="H3820"\w* gall \w and|strong="H3820"\w* gave \w me|strong="H4672"\w* vinegar \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w quench|strong="H7665"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* thirst.

\w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* table become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare; \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* retribution \w and|strong="H7219"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap.\f + \fr 69:22 \ft A slight revocalization of the Hebrew (see also LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate); literally may their prosperity be a trap; cited in Romans 11:9\f*

\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* eyes \w be|strong="H1961"\w* darkened \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* cannot see, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* backs \w be|strong="H1961"\w* bent forever.\f + \fr 69:23 \ft LXX; Hebrew and may their loins tremble continually; cited in Romans 11:10\f*

Pour \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* wrath \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* let \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* burning anger overtake \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.

May \w their|strong="H5921"\w* place \w be|strong="H2195"\w* deserted; let there \w be|strong="H2195"\w* \w no|strong="H8210"\w* one \w to|strong="H5921"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* tents.\f + \fr 69:25 \ft Cited in Acts 1:20\f*

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* they persecute \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H8074"\w* struck \w and|strong="H3427"\w* recount \w the|strong="H1961"\w* pain \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w You|strong="H8074"\w* wounded.
Add iniquity \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* iniquity; let \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* share \w in|strong="H5608"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* righteousness.

\w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Book \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Life \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* listed \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6666"\w*.
\w But|strong="H6662"\w* I am \w in|strong="H3789"\w* pain \w and|strong="H6662"\w* distress; let \w Your|strong="H5973"\w* salvation protect \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God.
\w I|strong="H3444"\w* \w will|strong="H3444"\w* praise God’s name \w in|strong="H3444"\w* song \w and|strong="H6041"\w* exalt \w Him|strong="H7682"\w* \w with|strong="H6041"\w* thanksgiving.

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w this|strong="H1431"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* please \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H1431"\w* than an ox, \w more|strong="H1431"\w* than \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bull \w with|strong="H1984"\w* horns \w and|strong="H8034"\w* hooves.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* humble \w will|strong="H3068"\w* see \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice. \w You|strong="H3190"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w be|strong="H3068"\w* revived!

\w For|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* listens \w to|strong="H3824"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* needy \w and|strong="H7200"\w* does \w not|strong="H7200"\w* despise \w His|strong="H7200"\w* captive \w people|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w Him|strong="H8085"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas \w and|strong="H3068"\w* everything \w that|strong="H3588"\w* moves \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* save Zion \w and|strong="H8064"\w* rebuild \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Judah, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H3220"\w* dwell \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* possess \w it|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* descendants \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w His|strong="H3588"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* love \w His|strong="H3588"\w* name \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w settle|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.
